content: But these growing costs taking a big portion of those margins comparing to last year and that's why MatÃ­as later will explain some of the lower margins on the first semester that is the less important in a number of crops, majority counts in summer that will be reflected in the third and the fourth quarter. And in the real estate the second effect on the balance sheet, the last year -- the first semester was mainly affected by very good real estate sales, a lot of sales done mainly in Brazil, all of them in Brazil. On a consolidated basis, we can see the net debt evolution with important reduction since 2020 from almost $1.2 billion to $680 million much more diversified in the next years the expiration.
